titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 131 of title 5, United States Code, with respect to prohibited financial transactions, and for other purposes.
A bill to amend chapter 131 of title 5, United States Code, with respect to prohibited financial transactions, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
